extDesc.message: Stream Visited Links: Your smart history recorder. Stream Visited Links saves the webpages you actually read, and makes them easily accessible on all your mobile devices for convenient viewing anywhere.

importHistDialog_desc.message: Press "Yes" to import your recent web history into your Stream Account from Google Chrome.

importHistDialog_btn_yes.description: Import history dialog YES button text

importHistDialog_btn_no.description: Import history dialog NO button text

importHistDialog_importing_without_date.description: Import history dialog importing without date information

importHistDialog_importing_with_date.description: Import history dialog importing with date information
